summary: Daily page header was updated to "Today's SweetSteps" and now displays today’s date. The tasks container card/heading appears removed in favor of a simple list wrapper. Task rows are now clickable and open TaskModal with derived title/description and minutes, but the completion flow does not appear to execute/close as required, and additional unrequested UI (footer) was added.

missing_requirements.requirement: Completing the task via the modal should execute the existing onComplete callback flow (and then close the modal).
missing_requirements.reason: The provided onComplete handler only logs to the console and does not close the modal or demonstrate integration with any existing completion flow/callback beyond the local console.log.
evidence: frontend/src/pages/Daily.tsx (handleTaskComplete only console.log; passed as onComplete)

hallucinated_features.description: Added a new footer section with © 2026 and an external link to caffeine.ai on the Daily page.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest only requested header changes, task container styling changes, and wiring task taps to open TaskModal; it did not request adding a footer or external link.

hallucinated_features.description: Introduced placeholder task data and a new local DailyStep/DailyData data shape in Daily.tsx.
hallucinated_features.reason: The BuildRequest did not request changing the data source/model for daily tasks or introducing placeholder data; it focused on UI wiring/styling and modal behavior.
